words.source: Conjunction vav + Qal imperfect feminine singular of אכל (akhal, 'to eat') with energic nun and feminine plural suffix
Definite article + feminine plural construct of פרה (parah, 'cow'); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Definite article + feminine plural of רק (raq, 'lean, thin'); KJV 'lean', ESV 'thin', NASB 'lean'
Conjunction vav + definite article + feminine plural of רע (ra', 'bad, ugly, ill-favored'); KJV 'ill favoured', ESV 'ugly', NASB 'ugly'
Direct object marker; indicates the following noun is the definite object of the verb
Feminine construct form of שבע (sheva', 'seven'); used with feminine plural noun
Definite article + feminine plural of פרה (parah, 'cow'); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Definite article + feminine plural of ראשון (rishon, 'first'); KJV, ESV, NASB, NIV
Definite article + feminine plural of בריא (bri', 'healthy, fat, well-fed'); KJV 'fat', ESV 'plump', NASB 'fat', NIV 'fat'
